attributes.action: Request Her Majesty The Queen to disolve Parliament and call an immediate General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The sheer incompetence of a government which is unable to foresee the consequences of its actions, (e.g. the 10p. tax rate and retrospective Vehicle Excise Duty) and unable to live up to its manifesto promises (e.g. E.U.Treaty Referendum), gives the public no confidence in the Government M.Ps'. ability to represent them in the near term

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
